snippet: The Irish police charged eight men with Irish Republican Army membership Friday, after police officers raided a suspected meeting of the group’s Dublin leadership.
abstract: Police in Ireland charge eight men with Irish Republican Army membership after officers raid a suspected meeting of the group's Dublin leadership.
lead_paragraph: The Irish police charged eight men with Irish Republican Army membership Friday, after police officers raided a suspected meeting of the group’s Dublin leadership.

headline.main: Ireland: 8 Face Charges of I.R.A. Ties
headline.print_headline: Ireland: 8 Face Charges of I.R.A. Ties
